summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Hydrate + Glow Kit is a 4-piece kit including all the goods First Aid Beauty has to offer that will have you glowing and radiant all day long.
details: DetailsFeaturesThis kit includes a complete facial skincare routine, guaranteed to cleanse, brighten and nourish the skin so you are hydrated and glowing all day.Formulated WithoutParabensFormaldehydesMineral OilsSulfatesIncludesPure Skin Face Cleanser (2.0 oz)Facial Radiance Pads (60 ct)Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer (0.34 oz)Brighten + Glow Eye Cream (0.5 oz)Item 2642430How To UsePure Skin Face Cleanser: Dampen face and dispense a dime-sized amount of cleanser onto fingertips. Gently massage onto all areas of the face. Remove with water or a soft, damp washcloth. Use twice daily, morning and night.Facial Radiance Pads: Start with clean, dry skin  Wipe pad across face, neck and décolleté once or twice daily.  Follow with moisturizer and SPF.  Dispose in trash or compost after use.Brighten + Glow Eye Cream: After cleansing, gently apply to the entire orbital eye area/ Avoid direct contact with eyes.Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer: Apply twice daily, morning and night, after cleansing.Precautions: Facial Radiance Pads: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children.  Anyone can use this product. A patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin. Sunburn Alert: This product contains Glycolic and Lactic Acids that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards. IngredientsPure Skin Face Cleanser: Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Coconut Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Colloidal Oatmeal, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Sodium PCA, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Isethionate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Maltodextrin, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol.Facial Radiance Pads: Aqua/Water/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Water, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Hydroxide.Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Cetyl Alcohol, Squalane, Ceramide NP, Urea, Allantoin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide.Brighten + Glow Eye Cream: Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Maris Aqua (Sea Water, Eau De Mer), Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Polysilicone-11, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Panthenol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Caffeine, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Chrysanthemum Parthenium Extract, Citric Acid, Coffea Arabica Seed Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Cucurbita Pepo Seed Extract, Gigartina Stellata/Kappaphycus Alvarezii Extract, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Hexylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Laureth-8, Lecithin, Linoleic Acid, Oleic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Phytosteryl Canola Glycerides, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Polysorbate 60, Silica, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Squalane, Stearic Acid, Tocopherol, Triolein, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Ci 77491, Ci 77891Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Pure Skin Face Cleanser: Dampen face and dispense a dime-sized amount of cleanser onto fingertips. Gently massage onto all areas of the face. Remove with water or a soft, damp washcloth. Use twice daily, morning and night.Facial Radiance Pads: Start with clean, dry skin  Wipe pad across face, neck and décolleté once or twice daily.  Follow with moisturizer and SPF.  Dispose in trash or compost after use.Brighten + Glow Eye Cream: After cleansing, gently apply to the entire orbital eye area/ Avoid direct contact with eyes.Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer: Apply twice daily, morning and night, after cleansing.Precautions: Facial Radiance Pads: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children.  Anyone can use this product. A patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin. Sunburn Alert: This product contains Glycolic and Lactic Acids that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
ingredients: Sodium Hydroxide.Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer: Aqua/Water/Eau
Sodium Hydroxide.Brighten + Glow Eye Cream: Aqua/Water/Eau
